author: jeffbi
body:
The Send-MailMessage cmdlet has been enabled for Core via Pull Request #3869, but testing is limited to Linux. We need to develop cross-platform tests for the cmdlet.

One option is to use a "fake" SMTP server, possibly the [.Net Fake SMTP Server](https://github.com/cmendible/netDumbster) as suggested by @iSazonov.
title: Create cross-platform tests for Send-MailMessage
